nodes.text: The Imperial Engineering Corps, also called Imperial Engineering or Imperial Corps of Engineers, were a corps of engineers in the Galactic Empire's Military. They were responsible for building operations for the military, such as constructing bases.

Engineering's constructions included the Imperial Ore Facility on Raxus Prime and the Raxus Prime Imperial Shipyard in orbit of Raxus. The latter used metal collected from the surface to build Star Destroyers and was mentioned to be the most important construction project undertaken by the Corps at the time, around 2 BBY. The Engineering Corps also searched out for obedient alien populations to act as laborers.
In 9 ABY, Grand Admiral Thrawn mentioned to Joruus C'baoth, the mad clone of Jedi Master Jorus C'baoth, that the Corps was responsible for building him an island on the planet of Jomark.
